title: Turning abandoned mines into batteries | IIASA
excerpt: A novel technique called Underground Gravity Energy Storage turns decommissioned mines into long-term energy storage solutions, thereby supporting the sustainable energy transition.

title: Scientists Made An Artificial "Cloud" That Pulls Electricity From Air
excerpt: A new prototype compatible with a wide range of materials could grab a continuous supply of renewable energy from the air.

title: ‘It was an accident’: the scientists who have turned humid air into renewab

title: Super Hot Sand Could Help Us Store Renewable Energy
excerpt: It’d be much cheaper than lithium battery storage.

title: How Much Energy Can You Store in a Stack of Cement Blocks?
excerpt: It's not a trick question: You can make a battery out of concrete by storing gravitational potential energy.

title: This technology could fundamentally change our relationship to electricity
excerpt: An “operating system” for power could double the efficiency of the grid.
